Title: How do you prepare and how do you eat?
Designer: Central People's Government Ministry of Health (中央人民政府卫生部)
Publisher: Hygiene propaganda and education materials workshop of the Central Ministry of Health (中央卫生部卫生宣传教器材制造所)
Notes: Seventh poster of the 1954 series "Why do we eat?" (我们为什么要吃东西?).Illustrations show how to wash rice, prepare bread, and prepare vegetables. The chart indicates preparation time and cooking loss of various vegetables.
